Class GameView

  • java.lang.Object
    • ImageView
      • edu.OOSE.cs.jhu.group2.PopZombiesUI.GameView

  • public class GameView
extends ImageView
    GameView class that is responsible for rendering the view of the game.
    Author:
    Connie Chang, Ted Staley, Elaine Chao
